definition: nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
(negative prefix)/not/no

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: The view of the lake from here is great.
sentences.chinese: 从这儿看到的湖景美不胜收。

sentences.english: To cruise here is like wandering in a natural art gallery.
sentences.chinese: 巡游于此恍若漫步于大自然的艺术画廊，美不胜收。

sentences.english: The shantou university，which covered in the thick spring scenery，is a very beautiful place.
sentences.chinese: 覆盖在浓浓春色里的汕头大学，美不胜收。

sentences.english: The scenery as one travels by boat along the Changjiang Three Gorges is marvelous.
sentences.chinese: 坐船游览长江三峡的时候，两岸的风景美不胜收。

sentences.english: The golden autumn found the Mosel valley gorgeous in the sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 金秋十月，莫泽尔河谷阳光闪烁，美不胜收。

sentences.english: Finally, there is particular beauty in these photographic images of the Solar System.
sentences.chinese: 最后，这些太阳系的摄影图片确实美不胜收。
到处银装素裹，美不胜收。

sentences.english: Contributing to the beautiful composition, meteor streak and church apex both gesture toward the North Celestial Pole.
sentences.chinese: 流星尾迹和教堂塔尖都指向北极星，真是美不胜收。

sentences.english: The city where we spent our vacation was very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 我们度假的那个城市美不胜收。

sentences.english: It is beauteous to eat dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 就饺子吃更是美不胜收。

sentences.english: A: The shop is a feast for the eyes indeed.
sentences.chinese: 你们店实在是琳琅满目，美不胜收。

definition: (of scenery) stunning/spectacular/picturesque
(of houses, scenery etc) magnificent (idiom)
picturesque
beautiful scenery
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
to linger/to remain enjoying oneself and forget to go home
bright and colorful/gorgeous
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
to have quite a lasting charm
to set each other off nicely
water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
view/scenery/scene
many postures
lit. heart untroubled, spirit pleased (idiom); carefree and relaxed
elegant/magnificent/exceptionally beautiful
